attributes.action: Honour his promise to the British Electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the time of the last General Election the Prime Minister stated that he would serve a full term in office, it was on this basis that he and his party were elected.If the Prime Minister stands down from office before he serves a full term his replacement would be someone whom the electorate did not choose to be Prime Minister and therefore has no mandate from the people to become PM. If the Prime Minister will not serve a full term in office a General Election should be held to gain the peoples approval for any successor to him

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
